long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "Case Converter" Chrome extension is a versatile and user-friendly tool designed to simplify the process of converting text between different case formats. Whether you need to change text to UPPERCASE, lowercase, Title Case, Sentence case, or tOGGLE cASE, this extension provides a quick and efficient solution.

Key Features:
Multiple Case Conversion Options:

UPPERCASE: Converts all letters in the text to uppercase.
lowercase: Converts all letters in the text to lowercase.
Title Case: Capitalizes the first letter of each word, ideal for headlines and titles.
Sentence case: Capitalizes the first letter of the first word, suitable for standard sentence formatting.
tOGGLE cASE: Inverts the case of each letter, making lowercase letters uppercase and vice versa.
Intuitive Interface:

The extension features a clean, minimalist design with a user-friendly interface. Users can easily input their text, select the desired case format from a dropdown menu, and see the converted result instantly.
Effortless Copying:

After converting the text, users can quickly copy the output to their clipboard with a single click, streamlining the process of pasting the converted text into documents, emails, or other applications.
Persistent Data:

The extension automatically saves the input and output text, allowing users to return to their previous work without losing any data. This feature is particularly useful for users who need to revisit or modify their conversions.
Lightweight and Fast:

Designed to be lightweight, the extension runs efficiently without consuming significant system resources, ensuring a smooth user experience.
Privacy-Focused:

All text processing is done locally within the browser, and no data is transmitted to external servers. This ensures complete privacy and security for users' information.
